verses.roman:
śrī-nityānanda-vṛkṣera skandha gurutara
tāhāte janmila śākhā-praśākhā vistara

synonyms: śrī-nityānanda-vṛkṣera—of the tree known as Śrī Nityānanda; skandha—main branch; gurutara—extremely heavy; tāhāte—from that branch; janmila—grew; śākhā—branches; praśākhā—subbranches; vistara—expansively.
translation: Śrī Nityānanda Prabhu is an extremely heavy branch of the Śrī Caitanya tree. From that branch grow many branches and subbranches.
